name: DOC_INFORMATION_2
description: The DOC_INFORMATION table contains information about documents, including scanned and electronically signed documents.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: DOC_RDI_ID
columns.description: Stores the linked form (RDI) that contains key-value pairs.

columns.name: COMM_ORIG_RDI_ID
columns.description: This item stores the original form (RDI) ID when a form is converted to a PDF.

columns.name: RSH_LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID
columns.description: The last user who updated the research data capture form.

columns.name: RSH_LAST_UPDATE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The last instant this data capture form was updated.

columns.name: RSH_FORM_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: Used to indicate whether or not all of the required fields on an esignature document's smartform have been completed.

columns.name: DOC_SPEC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The document specialty for a document (DCS) record.

columns.name: DOC_SUBSPECIALTY_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the document subspecialty for a document (DCS) record

columns.name: TMPLT_SF_FORM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the SmartForm used to collect information for this document. Should be used in conjunction with DOC_INFORMATION.TMPLT_SF_CNTCT to identify the SmartForm Record.

columns.name: TMPLT_SF_FORM_ID_FORM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the form associated with the questionnaire.

columns.name: RSH_FORM_NAME
columns.description: The instance name for the research data capture form.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_USAGE_C_NAME
columns.description: The document usage category ID for the document record.

columns.name: BLOB_CATEGORY_C_NAME
columns.description: The blob category for the document.

columns.name: RX_CUST_ID_OWNER_NAM_RECORD_ID
columns.description: This item contains a pointer to the name record of the owner of the customer ID used to pick up the prescriptions for the patient from outpatient pharmacies.

columns.name: ESIG_ACCESSIBLE_PDF_FILE
columns.description: Stores the file name for the accessible PDF of this document on the BLOB.

columns.name: SERIES_SEQ_NUM
columns.description: The sequence number of the series in a DICOM study (attribute 0020,0011).

columns.name: PS_SERIES_UID
columns.description: The instance UID of the series that has the presentation state for the image.

columns.name: PS_UID
columns.description: The presentation state instance UID for the image.

columns.name: IMAGE_SEQUENCE_NUM
columns.description: The image sequence number within the series (attribute 0020,0013).

columns.name: IMG_SLCT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID indicating how the DICOM image associated with the record was selected, including if it was computer selected or marked as a key image.

columns.name: FILE_CREATION_TIME
columns.description: Stores the timestamp in HL7 format of when the file was created on the blob or DMS server.

columns.name: FILE_LAST_UPD_TIME
columns.description: Timestamp in HL7 format of when the image was last updated.

columns.name: FILE_TYPE
columns.description: Mime type of the image/document.

columns.name: CLN_DOC_SRC_APT_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The appointment that a Document Information (DCS) record was attached to before it was moved to a Clinical Documentation Only encounter.

columns.name: ENROLL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the research study association that has been linked to this document.

columns.name: FILE_CREATION_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the file creation time of the document on the Web Blob Server (WBS)

columns.name: DEFERRED_GEN_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The deferred generation status category ID for the document. This field is only used for deferred generation documents.

columns.name: DOC_TX_ID
columns.description: Stores ETR ID for the service-line on a claim that the document is associated with, used by Tapestry

columns.name: START_DOC_PERIOD_DATE
columns.description: Start date of document period.

columns.name: END_DOC_PERIOD_DATE
columns.description: End date fo document period.

columns.name: CLM_ATTACH_CTL_NUM
columns.description: Attachment control number for electronic attachments. This is used to identify electronic attachments for a claim in an ANSI X12 275.

columns.name: CLM_PROV_ACCT_NUM
columns.description: Provider submitted account number for electronic attachments. This is used to identify electronic attachments for a claim in an ANSI X12 275.

columns.name: CLAIM_VENDOR_NPI
columns.description: NPI of the vendor sent in ANSI X12 275. This is used to identify electronic attachments for a claim in an ANSI X12 275.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_IDENT_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the identifier for this document, which is stored in item 350, is a native Epic identifier, or an identifier assigned by external system. When this item is set to 1-Native, the identifier refers to binary data that was uploaded through the Blob service. If the identifier was generated by an external system, this item is set to 2-External. If this item is set to 0-Unknown or not set, then other items must be used to determine if item 350 is a Blob or external identifier.

columns.name: EOB_MEMBER_SHARE_AMOUNT
columns.description: Total amount a member is responsible for, for all the claims included in an Explanation of Benefits document.
